data.name: Hydra Scientist
data.description: Hydra scientists use experimental treatments to heal their comrades.

starItems.name: Hydra Scientist
starItems.description: Hydra scientists use experimental treatments to heal their comrades.

1.description:
Attack primary target for <color=#86e619>80%</color> damage and <color=#86e619>10%</color> Piercing. <color=#86e619>30%</color> chance to apply <color=#fff568>Heal Block</color> for <color=#86e619>1</color> turn.

If Red Skull is an ally, always apply <color=#fff568>Heal Block</color>.

2.description:
Attack primary target for <color=#86e619>130%</color> damage and <color=#86e619>10%</color> Piercing. <color=#86e619>30%</color> chance to apply <color=#fff568>Heal Block</color> for <color=#86e619>1</color> turn.

If Red Skull is an ally, always apply <color=#fff568>Heal Block</color>.

3.description:
Attack primary target for <color=#86e619>150%</color> damage and <color=#86e619>15%</color> Piercing. <color=#86e619>30%</color> chance to apply <color=#fff568>Heal Block</color> for <color=#86e619>1</color> turn.

If Red Skull is an ally, always apply <color=#fff568>Heal Block</color>.
3.nextUpgrade:
+<color=#86e619>50%</color> damage to primary target
+<color=#86e619>20%</color> chance to apply <color=#fff568>Heal Block</color>

4.description:
Attack primary target for <color=#86e619>200%</color> damage and <color=#86e619>15%</color> Piercing. <color=#86e619>50%</color> chance to apply <color=#fff568>Heal Block</color> for <color=#86e619>1</color> turn.

If Red Skull is an ally, always apply <color=#fff568>Heal Block</color>.

5.description:
Attack primary target for <color=#86e619>220%</color> damage and <color=#86e619>20%</color> Piercing. <color=#86e619>50%</color> chance to apply <color=#fff568>Heal Block</color> for <color=#86e619>1</color> turn.

If Red Skull is an ally, always apply <color=#fff568>Heal Block</color>.

6.description:
Attack primary target for <color=#86e619>260%</color> damage and <color=#86e619>20%</color> Piercing. <color=#86e619>50%</color> chance to apply <color=#fff568>Heal Block</color> for <color=#86e619>1</color> turn.

If Red Skull is an ally, always apply <color=#fff568>Heal Block</color>.

7.description:
Attack primary target for <color=#86e619>280%</color> damage and <color=#86e619>25%</color> Piercing. <color=#86e619>50%</color> chance to apply <color=#fff568>Heal Block</color> for <color=#86e619>1</color> turn.

If Red Skull is an ally, always apply <color=#fff568>Heal Block</color>.

1.description:
Apply <color=#fff568>Deathproof</color> and <color=#fff568>Deflect</color> to the most injured ally and Heal that ally for <color=#86e619>200</color> Health + <color=#86e619>10%</color> of this character's Max Health.

On <color=#fff568>WAR DEFENSE</color>, clear <color=#fff568>Stun</color> from Red Skull ally.

2.description:
Apply <color=#fff568>Deathproof</color> and <color=#fff568>Deflect</color> to the most injured ally and Heal that ally for <color=#86e619>800</color> Health + <color=#86e619>10%</color> of this character's Max Health.

On <color=#fff568>WAR DEFENSE</color>, clear <color=#fff568>Stun</color> from Red Skull ally.

3.description:
Apply <color=#fff568>Deathproof</color> and <color=#fff568>Deflect</color> to the most injured ally and Heal that ally for <color=#86e619>1,500</color> Health + <color=#86e619>10%</color> of this character's Max Health.

On <color=#fff568>WAR DEFENSE</color>, clear <color=#fff568>Stun</color> from Red Skull ally.

4.description:
Apply <color=#fff568>Deathproof</color> and <color=#fff568>Deflect</color> to the most injured ally and Heal that ally for <color=#86e619>2,500</color> Health + <color=#86e619>10%</color> of this character's Max Health.

On <color=#fff568>WAR DEFENSE</color>, clear <color=#fff568>Stun</color> from Red Skull ally.
4.nextUpgrade:
+<color=#86e619>2,000</color> Health
+<color=#86e619>5%</color> of this character's Max Health

5.description:
Apply <color=#fff568>Deathproof</color> and <color=#fff568>Deflect</color> to the most injured ally and Heal that ally for <color=#86e619>4,500</color> Health + <color=#86e619>15%</color> of this character's Max Health.

On <color=#fff568>WAR DEFENSE</color>, clear <color=#fff568>Stun</color> from Red Skull ally.

6.description:
Apply <color=#fff568>Deathproof</color> and <color=#fff568>Deflect</color> to the most injured ally and Heal that ally for <color=#86e619>7,000</color> Health + <color=#86e619>15%</color> of this character's Max Health.

On <color=#fff568>WAR DEFENSE</color>, clear <color=#fff568>Stun</color> from Red Skull ally.
6.nextUpgrade:
+<color=#86e619>3,000</color> Health
+<color=#86e619>5%</color> of this character's Max Health

7.description:
Apply <color=#fff568>Deathproof</color> and <color=#fff568>Deflect</color> to the most injured ally and Heal that ally for <color=#86e619>10,000</color> Health + <color=#86e619>20%</color> of this character's Max Health.

On <color=#fff568>WAR DEFENSE</color>, clear <color=#fff568>Stun</color> from Red Skull ally.

1.description:
Gain +<color=#86e619>5%</color> Max Health. <color=#fff568>HYDRA MINION</color> and Red Skull allies gain +<color=#86e619>5%</color> Max Health.

On Turn, <color=#86e619>30%</color> chance to apply <color=#fff568>Regeneration</color> + <color=#86e619>1</color> random positive effect to the most injured <color=#fff568>HYDRA</color> ally.

On <color=#fff568>WAR DEFENSE</color>, when an enemy drops below <color=#86e619>50%</color> Health, apply <color=#fff568>Defense Down</color> and <color=#fff568>Offense Down</color> to that enemy.
1.nextUpgrade: +<color=#86e619>20%</color> chance to apply <color=#fff568>Regeneration</color> + <color=#86e619>1</color> random positive effects to the <color=#86e619>2</color> most injured <color=#fff568>HYDRA</color> allies

2.description:
Gain +<color=#86e619>5%</color> Max Health. <color=#fff568>HYDRA MINION</color> and Red Skull allies gain +<color=#86e619>5%</color> Max Health.

On Turn, <color=#86e619>50%</color> chance to apply <color=#fff568>Regeneration</color> + <color=#86e619>1</color> random positive effect to the <color=#86e619>2</color> most injured <color=#fff568>HYDRA</color> allies.

On <color=#fff568>WAR DEFENSE</color>, when an enemy drops below <color=#86e619>50%</color> Health, apply <color=#fff568>Defense Down</color> and <color=#fff568>Offense Down</color> to that enemy.
2.nextUpgrade:
+<color=#86e619>5%</color> Max Health for self, <color=#fff568>HYDRA MINION</color> and Red Skull allies
+<color=#86e619>20%</color> chance to apply <color=#fff568>Regeneration</color> + random positive effects

3.description:
Gain +<color=#86e619>10%</color> Max Health. <color=#fff568>HYDRA MINION</color> and Red Skull allies gain +<color=#86e619>10%</color> Max Health.

On Turn, <color=#86e619>70%</color> chance to apply <color=#fff568>Regeneration</color> + <color=#86e619>1</color> random positive effect to the <color=#86e619>2</color> most injured <color=#fff568>HYDRA</color> allies.

On <color=#fff568>WAR DEFENSE</color>, when an enemy drops below <color=#86e619>50%</color> Health, apply <color=#fff568>Defense Down</color> and <color=#fff568>Offense Down</color> to that enemy.
3.nextUpgrade: Always apply <color=#fff568>Regeneration</color> + <color=#86e619>1</color>-<color=#86e619>2</color> random positive effects to the <color=#86e619>2</color> most injured <color=#fff568>HYDRA</color> allies

4.description:
Gain +<color=#86e619>10%</color> Max Health. <color=#fff568>HYDRA MINION</color> and Red Skull allies gain +<color=#86e619>10%</color> Max Health.

On Turn, apply <color=#fff568>Regeneration</color> + <color=#86e619>1</color>-<color=#86e619>2</color> random positive effects to the <color=#86e619>2</color> most injured <color=#fff568>HYDRA</color> allies.

On <color=#fff568>WAR DEFENSE</color>, when an enemy drops below <color=#86e619>50%</color> Health, apply <color=#fff568>Defense Down</color> and <color=#fff568>Offense Down</color> to that enemy.
4.nextUpgrade:
+<color=#86e619>10%</color> Max Health for self, <color=#fff568>HYDRA MINION</color> and Red Skull allies
Apply <color=#fff568>Regeneration</color> + <color=#86e619>2</color> random positive effects to the <color=#86e619>2</color> most injured <color=#fff568>HYDRA</color> allies

5.description:
Gain +<color=#86e619>20%</color> Max Health. <color=#fff568>HYDRA MINION</color> and Red Skull allies gain +<color=#86e619>20%</color> Max Health.

On Turn, apply <color=#fff568>Regeneration</color> + <color=#86e619>2</color> random positive effects to the <color=#86e619>2</color> most injured <color=#fff568>HYDRA</color> allies.

On <color=#fff568>WAR DEFENSE</color>, when an enemy drops below <color=#86e619>50%</color> Health, apply <color=#fff568>Defense Down</color> and <color=#fff568>Offense Down</color> to that enemy.
